    • Method Detail

      • startSystem

        public void startSystem()
        This method will be executed when user needs to start this system. It will read information from a text file called "participants.txt" automatically. Then it will provide a menu so that one can operate the system.

      • selectGame

        public void selectGame()
        case1:select project and determine whether to add new players

      • runningTheGames

        public void runningTheGames()
        case3: Run all races Statistical performance of athlete to a running game. Note, super athletes can participate in all three types of games. This exception is also for attempts of assigning an athlete as an official or assigning an official to a game.

      • predictGame

        public void predictGame()
        case 2: predict winner

      • calThePlayerScores

        public void calThePlayerScores()
        case 5: Calculate fraction and sort the athletes' grades

      • loadPlayers

        public void loadPlayers()
        loadPlayers method used to read all athletes' information from "participants.txt" Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

      • loadOffics

        public void loadOffics()
                throws NoRefereeException
        loading referee method used to read all officials' information from "participants.txt"
        Throws:
        NoRefereeException - when trying run a game which has no official appointed.
